about_the_game:
Sound in the Silence is a horror survival game that challenges players to face their fears in a quiet and foreboding environment filled with unsettling sounds. Players must seek out and destroy 10 hidden Totems scattered throughout the dark and dangerous area. Each Totem destroyed causes more monsters to spawn and the surrounding noises to intensify, heightening the sense of dread and tension.

The increasing sounds create an ever-growing feeling of anxiety, making each step more treacherous as players venture toward the next Totem. The fear of hearing unsettling noises or being surrounded by monsters adds to the challenge and requires careful navigation. The game concludes when all 10 Totems are successfully destroyed, testing your endurance and resolve to the limit.

Sound in the Silence offers an immersive experience that horror game enthusiasts won't want to miss, putting your courage and problem-solving skills to the ultimate test in a constantly shifting and mysterious environment.
